title: Belmont Court #E5 2Bed AVAIL 10.1 $2145
posting_body: This four story 61-unit building offers an affordable option in a great location!
Live in the popular Clark & Belmont neighborhood - right above a Starbucks coffee shop and a block away from the Brown/Red/Purple Belmont El train stop.
VERY LARGE and carpeted units with individual heat and A/C. Laundry facility on-site along with a small cardio center.
Outdoor permit parking is also available for an additional cost on a month-to-month basis.
Steps to public transportation, restaurants, nightlife, hair salon, dry cleaners, theatres, park, gym, café, neighborhood bar & grill, music venue and shopping.
Walk to the following train and bus routes:
Red, Brown, and Purple train lines
With the building located in one of the most popular areas of the city, residents can enjoy the grandeur of a past architectural age amid the modern conveniences of today.
Amenities and this ideal location make this one of the most popular complexes in the city.
• Brand new kitchen with stainless steel appliances and granite countertops.
• Be The First to Live Here.
• Just renovated, Newly renovated, Complete gut rehab
• New cabinets in kitchen, new cabinets in bathroom
Our buildings are cat friendly, but sorry - dogs are not allowed.
Please Call 773-348-6900 or email to set up a tour!
We are family owned and committed to great customer service!
***NO APPLICATION FEE*** Apply for free at edcrents.com
We do require first month’s rent and administrative fee ($175/Studio; $275/1BD; $350/2BD; $450/3BD) due at lease signing, and a security deposit (1st month’s rent due) at key pick up.
